content: Jack and Sarah met through a mutual friend who knew they were both interested in entrepreneurship. The friend introduced them at a startup networking event, and they hit it off immediately. They both shared a passion for creating solutions that solve real-world problems and were looking for a new opportunity to work on together. After several discussions, they decided to start a new venture focused on private outdoor spaces, which they believed had the potential to be a game-changer in urban areas. Tom and Lisa were introduced to the team through their professional networks and joined the team based on their shared vision and expertise.
